standard.description: These are best practices that apply to Universal Theme applications.

test.query_clob:
with std as (select apb.application_id, 
                    apb.page_id, 
                    apb.button_id component_id, 
                    apb.button_name, 
                    bto.column_value template_option,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    apb.last_updated_by,
                    apb.last_updated_on,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
						 				abo.status_on_export,
						        apb.workspace
            from apex_application_page_buttons apb
            inner join table(apex_string.split(apb.button_template_options, ':')) bto 
                        on bto.column_value in ('rw-Button--sm', 'rw-Button--md', 'rw-Button--lg', 't-Button--tiny', 't-Button--small', 't-Button--large')
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                  and aap.page_id = apb.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  abo.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name
            where apb.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
						and coalesce(abo.status_on_export, 'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have a default size but currently has a size of `%3`', 
                          p0 => std.button_name,
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.template_option) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have a default size', 
                          p0 => std.button_name,
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id) issue_title,
       std.component_id,
       std.button_name,
       std.template_option,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: Button size should be default - always.
test.fix: Restore the button size to default
